name: S2019: MANDATORY ATTENDANCE
description:
Premise

You are an unnamed professor at an Ohio university who is sick of your students skipping your 8:30 AM lecture. Taking measures into your own hands, you decide one day to sneak into the students' maze-like, heavily guarded dorm to wake them up yourself.

Instructions

Arrow Keys to move
Spacebar to interact with objects (stairs, terminals, beds)
Avoid obstacles like guards and cameras
Terminals will disable obstacles
Get to the student's bed to reveal the stairs 
Get to the stairs to move on to the next level

Developers

Jae Yong Kim, Brian Pang, Chris Zhang

Credits/Acknowledgements

Background Music: "Basement Floor" by Kevin MacLeod
Additional Voices by Michael Fu, PhD and Wilhelm Scream
